traits.name: Heart Sight
traits.description: The sprite touches a creature and magically knows the creature's current emotional state. If the target fails a DC 10 Charisma saving throw, the sprite also knows the creature's alignment.

traits.name: Invisibility
traits.description: The sprite turns Invisible until it attacks, it casts a spell, or its Concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Equipment the sprite wears or carries is also Invisible.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.description: *Ranged:* +6, range 40/160 ft. *Hit:* 1 Piercing plus the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition for 1 minute. If the target fails the save by 5 or more, the target has the Poisoned and Unconscious conditions for the same duration.
